title: Entertainment Live: Jack Dee quits Apprentice You're Fired and other news - BBC News
summary: jack dee quits the apprentice : you 're fired .
princess diaries 3 'is happening ' with anne hathaway .
carol tops poll of best lgbt films .

documents.title: goodbye for now
text: that 's all we have time for today .
but before we go , here 's more from hamilton creator lin-manuel miranda and his day out at the white house .
earlier we brought you footage of the special performance he and other cast members from his history/hip-hop mash-up gave at president obama 's crib on monday .
but that was n't all he got up to .
in between performing songs from his broadway smash and answering schoolkids ' questions , he also found time for some freestyle rapping - with the prez helping him out with cue card suggestions .
it 's not as easy as miranda makes it look .
author: Neil Smith
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: princess diaries 3 'is happening '
text: yes , you read that right - anne hathaway is set to reprise her role as mia thermopolis , the unlikely heir to the throne of genovia , in a second sequel to the princess diaries .
returning director garry marshall , .
above with hathaway and dame julie andrews , told people that the oscar-winning star of les miserables was on board for the third film in the series .
i was with anne hathaway a couple weeks ago , it looks like we want to do princess diaries 3 in manhattan .
anne hathaway is very pregnant , so we have to wait until she has the baby and then i think we 're going to do it .
let 's hope the film gets the greenlight and makes all our guilty pleasure dreams come true .
author: People

documents.title: ang lee leads protest against 'tone-deaf ' oscars
text: two-time oscar-winner ang lee is spearheading a protest against the academy of motion picture arts and sciences for a joke oscars host chris rock made at the expense of asian-americans at this year 's awards .
the comedian stands accused of perpetuating racial stereotypes for introducing a group of accountants who turned out to be asian children in suits during the 28 february ceremony .

according to a letter co-signed by lee , star trek actor george takei and around 20 others , the skit displayed `` a tone-deaf approach to its portrayal of asians '' in a year in which issues of inclusion and diversity were at the forefront of debate .

`` we 'd like to know how such tasteless and offensive skits could have happened and what process you have in place to preclude such unconscious or outright bias and racism toward any group in future oscars telecasts , '' the letter continues .
read more on this story .
author: Variety

documents.title: matthew perry to play ted kennedy in tv series
text: former friends star matthew perry is treading the boards in london at present in his self-penned play the end of longing .
but his next role will see him on an even grander stage - that of washington dc in the aftermath of the jfk and bobby kennedy assassinations .
perry will play ted kennedy ( above right ) in the kennedys - after camelot , a four-hour follow-up to 2011 mini-series the kennedys .
katie holmes will reprise her role as jacqueline kennedy onassis in the show , which begins filming in may and will be shown on the reelz cable channel next year .

documents.title: film director piers haggard receives obe
text: here 's a of film and tv director piers haggard , smiling broadly with the obe he received earlier from the duke of cambridge at buckingham palace .

haggard , who turns 77 on friday , is the founder of the directors guild of great britain as well as the director of venom , the blood on satan 's claw and the dennis potter tv serial pennies from heaven .
tuesday 's investiture ceremony also saw conductor sir neville marriner ( below ) made a companion of honour .

documents.title: peter buck : 'rem put me off music industry '
text: i hate the business and i do n't want anything to do with it .
strong words from rem guitarist peter buck , who gave a rare interview about the band 's demise to rolling stone magazine .
he explained rem 's split in 2011 was an amicable one , and that the band still see each other regularly .
but he remains disenchanted with the record industry .
in fact , after rem went their separate ways , he wrote a list of his pet hates about the business .
it ran to five pages .
`` it was the money , the politics , having to meet new people 24 hours a day , not being in charge of my own decisions , '' he said .
`` everything except writing songs , playing songs and recording them . ''
buck also said fans should n't expect a glut of unreleased or rare material to surface from the rem archives .
`` we do n't have a lot of left-over studio songs , '' he said .
`` michael [ stipe , vocalist ] generally did n't finish songs if he did n't like them .
`` it was n't like we had 20 songs to choose from for every album .
we 'd have 14 , and 12 would make the record .
the other two might be b-sides . ''
read the full interview .
author: Rolling Stone magazine

documents.title: game of thrones ' influence spreads to baby names
text: thor , loki and khaleesi were among the more unusual names given to scottish babies last year , according to the national records of scotland ( nrs ) .

the new list , which gives the complete details of forenames given to boys and girls in 2015 , points to the popularity of games of thrones , the marvel superhero films and other cultural success stories .
four boys , for example , were named kit last year , possibly after thrones star kit harington ( above ) .
read more on this story .

documents.title: kanye west and ellie goulding need you
text: ever thought you could write better lyrics than ellie goulding ( `` we got the fire , fire , fire / and we gon na let it burn , burn , burn , burn '' ) or kanye west ( i 'm in the french restaurant / hurry up with my damn croissants '' ) ?
well now you 're in luck
mumford and sons ' keyboard player ben lovett is putting together an anti-poverty album with ellie , kanye and a host of other artists , featuring 12 songs co-written by fans .
called metamorphoses , it 's in aid of global citizen , which aims to eradicate extreme poverty by 2030 .
here 's ben to explain more .
you can submit your efforts on global citizen 's website .

documents.title: kung fu panda 3 tops uk box office
text: animated sequel kung fu panda 3 topped the uk and ireland box office last weekend .

the film , which sees the vocal talents of jack black reunited with those of dustin hoffman , angelina jolie , seth rogen and lucy liu , took £ 4.8m in its opening three days and from previews the previous weekend .
it easily took the number one spot against other new entry allegiant - the third instalment in the divergent series - which took £ 1.83m and finished in second place .
here 's how the top five looks .

documents.title: catherine tate musical 'a bomb in almost every way '
text: a new musical starring catherine tate has opened in london - but reviewers have said it is more of a damp squib than an explosive success .
miss atomic bomb is set in 1952 when nuclear bombs were being tested near las vegas , making the area a tourist attraction .
mark shenton , in the stage , said it is `` a bomb in almost every way '' , awarding it just one star and saying `` the satire is lame , the songs desperately derivative '' .
daily mail reviewer patrick marmion said the show `` never really detonates '' - adding that , while tate `` makes the best of toe-curling gags '' , her comedy skills are `` underused '' .
read the full story .

documents.title: birth of a nation director to write paralympic wrestling drama
text: nate parker ( above ) , who wrote , directed and starred in the prize-winning sundance film the birth of a nation , is to adapt a memoir about disabled wrestlers for the big screen .
carry on , written by espn producer lisa fenn , follows the true story of wrestlers dartanyon crockett and leroy sutton .
despite being legally blind , crockett ( below ) was the best wrestler at his high school in ohio .
each day he would carry sutton to practice and matches - because his schoolmate lost his legs in a train accident when he was just 11 years old .
crockett went on to win a bronze medal in judo at the 2012 paralym
`` lisa fenn , dartanyon crockett and leroy sutton are true inspirations , '' said production company walden media .
`` we are excited to have brought on the talented nate parker to write their moving story of family , faith and the power of the human spirit and share it with the world . ''
read the full story .
author: The Wrap

documents.title: mura masa premieres new song
text: bedroom musician mura masa , who came fifth in the bbc 's sound of 2016 earlier this year , has just released his latest song , what if i go ?
it 's one of those tracks that wrong-foots you , as a dreamy steel drum riff suddenly gives way to a twisted , squelchy soup of synths .

premiering the song on annie mac 's radio 1 show last night , mura masa ( whose real name is alex crossan ) explained he was n't `` necessarily trying to make pop music '' but he did `` want to bring more of an accessibility to weird electronica '' .
see what you think below .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: elvis presley album heads for the stage
text: music from a chart-topping album featuring songs by elvis presley backed by the royal philharmonic orchestra is to come to the stage later this year .
the if i can dream arena tour will visit six venues in november , starting off at the sse hydro in glasgow on the 17th .
presley 's widow priscilla will be making a special appearance at the arena shows , tickets for which go on sale on friday .
if i can dream , which uses archive recordings of the king alongside new orchestral arrangements , spent two weeks at the top of the uk album chart last november .

documents.title: first david brent : life on the road posters revealed
text: the first posters for david brent : life on the road , a new film based around ricky gervais 's character from the office , have been revealed by its distributor .
the movie sees brent working as a cleaning products sales rep .
but he 's not given up on his dream of becoming a rock star , so he embarks on a self-financed uk tour .
it 'll be in uk and ireland cinemas on 19 august .
what do you make of the poster and will you go to see the film ?
let us know through the usual channels .

documents.title: keith emerson 's death was suicide , coroner rules
text: the death of rock musician keith emerson last week has been ruled a suicide by the los angeles coroner 's office .
emerson , co-founder and keyboardist of progressive rock band emerson , lake and palmer , was 71 years old and died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound .
read more on this story .

documents.title: danny dyer as you 've never seen him before
text: he 's played more hard men than dame barbara windsor has barred from the queen vic .
but danny dyer 's latest role is something of a departure .
as you can see above , the actor is playing a drag queen in nebraska , a new music video from singer-songwriter lucy rose .
dyer , who plays mick carter in eastenders , is seen in the video as a troubled character who finds solace in performing .
it 's never played for laughs and dyer gives a surprisingly nuanced performance .
speaking to the independent , rose said she was very nervous about asking the actor to appear in the video .
dyer , though , responded by saying : `` let 's do it , i 've always wanted to be a drag queen . ''
dyer himself had this to say about his latest role :
when i got the treatment through i was overwhelmed .
i think it 's such a moving piece of work .
i 'm beyond proud to be part of it , i 've always believed that people should be who they wan na be , regardless of race or gender .
freedom of expression is so important - i really hope that this video gets the recognition it deserves .
watch the video in full below .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: is thomas rhett country music 's brightest new star ?
text: thomas rhett was one of the us country stars who performed at last weekend 's country 2 country music festival in london , glasgow and dublin .
say his name on this side of the pond and you 'll likely be met with a blank stare .
but it 's a different story on the other side of the atlantic , where he is a staple of country music radio stations and a force to be reckoned with on youtube .
thanks to his canny use of social media rhett 's profile is beginning to rise - thanks in no small part to his wife lauren gregory , who regularly appears in the he posts on twitter and instagram .
entertainment reporter steven mcintosh went to meet him .
read his feature .

documents.title: jack dee pulls out of apprentice spin-off
text: comedian jack dee has announced he is to quit his hosting role on the apprentice 's spin-off show you 're fired after just one series .
dee , who took over last year from irish comic dara o briain , blamed work commitments for the decision :
it 's been a tough decision to leave you 're fired .

i 'd like to thank the apprentice team , bbc two , the candidates and the 'big man ' lord sugar himself for making me feel so welcome but now , in keeping with the apprentice tradition , i am firing myself .
good luck with the next series .
it 's not yet known who will be the new host of the apprentice 's light-hearted bbc two companion show when it returns later this year .

documents.title: scotland 's third national poet appointed
text: poet and novelist jackie kay has been announced as the third scots makar , scotland 's new national poet .
kay follows in the footsteps of liz lochhead , whose five-yeartenure came to an end in january , and edwin morgan , the first holder of the post .
born in edinburgh and brought up in east dunbartonshire , kay - who was made an mbe in 2006 - now lives in manchester .
here 's what she had to say about her appointment .
i 'm absolutely delighted and honoured to have been chosen as scotland 's new makar and to follow in the footsteps of such really inspiring and wonderful poets .
i hope that i can do my country proud and do them proud .
it 's a really wonderful day for me , my family and everyone that loves me .
it feels a little like a fairytale .
read more on this story .

documents.title: carol tops poll of top 30 lgbt films
text: oscar-nominated romance carol has topped a survey of the top 30 lgbt ( lesbian , gay , bisexual and transgender ) films ever made , conducted to mark the 30th anniversary of the london lgbt film festival which begins on wednesday .

todd haynes 's film , about a shopgirl and a socialite who embark on a lesbian affair in 1950s new york , was ranked ahead of titles like brokeback mountain , my beautiful laundrette and my own private idaho by the 100-plus film-makers , writers and programmers who weighed in on the poll .
here 's what haynes had to say about his drama , for which both rooney mara and cate blanchett ( above ) were nominated for oscars , being ranked at number one .
i 'm so proud to have carol voted as the top lgbt film of all time in this poll launched for the fest 's 30th edition .
carol is in illustrious company with so many films i love .
bfi flare , the name by which the london lgbt film festival is now known , kicks off its latest edition with the pass , a new british drama about a closeted premier league footballer .

documents.title: viola beach tribute concert line-up revealed
text: the coral , liam fray and the kooks will perform at a tribute concert being planned for the band viola beach , whose members and manager died in a car crash in sweden last month .
kris leonard , river reeves , jack dakin and tomas lowe died with manager craig tarry near stockholm on 13 february .
radio 1 dj phil taggart will host the event at parr hall in warrington on 2 april .
other bands on the line-up include blossoms , hidden charms and eliza and the bear .
read more on this story .

documents.title: sony buys michael jackson 's stake in music catalogue
text: michael jackson 's estate has agreed to sell its remaining stake in sony 's music catalogue back to the company for $ 750m ( £ 527m ) .
the agreement will give sony sole ownership of sony/atv music publishing 's catalogue , which includes such artists as the beatles , bob dylan , eminem and taylor swift .
the sale does n't include rights to jackson 's master recordings or songs he wrote , and the singer 's estate will continue to have a stake in emi publishing .
the king of pop purchased the atv portion of the catalogue in 1985 for $ 41.5m ( £ 29m ) , later merging it with sony .
it was his most lucrative asset at the time of his death in june 2009 at the age of 50 .
`` this transaction further allows us to continue our efforts of maximising the value of michael 's estate for the benefit of his children , '' said jackson 's executors .
read more on this story .

documents.title: hamilton returns to the white house
text: seven years ago , lin-manuel miranda appeared at a white house poetry slam to perform what would go on to become the opening number of his hit musical hamilton .

on monday , the tony-winning composer and actor returned to 1600 pennsylvania avenue with the cast of his broadway phenomenon for a special performance of songs from his hip-hop biopic of alexander hamilton , america 's first treasury secretary .
the show is a favourite of president obama , who introduced the performance by trumpeting his own role in hamilton 's unlikely success story .
here 's how he introduced monday 's performance , which began with the same number that miranda - .
above between actors okieriete onaodowan ( left ) and christopher jackson ( right ) - performed for him and his wife , michelle , back in 2009 .

documents.title: anita brookner remembered
text: fans of the late anita brookner have taken to twitter to honour the booker-winning author of hotel du lac , whose death at the age of 87 has officially been confirmed .
according to a death notice published in tuesday 's times , the british author and renowned art historian died peacefully in her sleep on 10 march .
novelists jonathan coe and linda grant are among those who have paid tribute .
a great writer .
hotel du lac one of the best booker winners ever in my opinion .
@ twitterid mine too .
subtle and understated , profound and classy .
anita brookner was ill-served by younger female reviewers who thought her world was slight and complacent .
could n't be more wrong .
@ twitterid @ twitterid which book would you recommend for a first-timer ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid i 've only read one : her last , strangers , which i loved .
her own favourite was latecomers .
@ twitterid @ twitterid what kind of novelist is she ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid probably best known under her pseudonym george r martin
@ twitterid @ twitterid is this about me and women writers again ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid no just a joke about what kind of writer she was
@ twitterid @ twitterid yeah , just kidding
@ twitterid ill-served by the gurdian obituarist too .
@ twitterid just read it , bizarre .
where are the novels ?
@ twitterid classic piece of gurdian snobbery towards what it perceives ( incorrectly ) as 'middlebrow ' .
@ twitterid @ twitterid i fear source of contempt disclaimer-ridden `` the shock of her drama , although domestic , nevertheless registers ''
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid blimey .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid + '' stories of disillusion , personal betrayal , minor failure , & loneliness tho their scope is narrow ''
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid yes .
i 'm so cross and generally disappointed , i ca n't say .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid they rang me to ask if i 'd write a response but annoyingly timing did n't work .
@ twitterid i fell in love with anita brookner and read all her books when i was 14 , curled up on the floor of my school library .
@ twitterid and penelope lively , too , and barbara pym .
it 's a very specific time and place in my heart , fixed in place , unforgettable .
@ twitterid just female reviewers ?
@ twitterid i always admired her writing when i was much younger .
now i 'm older , it touches me so much more- her characters resonate .
@ twitterid also reminds me of the horrible `` dotty granny '' condescension penelope fitzgerald got from critics for far too long .

documents.title: get involved with the news
text: let us know your thoughts on today 's news by tweeting @ bbcnewsents or emailing entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
and if you missed it yesterday , check out monday 's live page .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome one , welcome all to another live page , dedicated to bringing you everything that 's hip and happening in the world of arts and entertainment .

today we 'll be bringing you reaction to the confirmation that the booker-winning author and historian anita brookner died last week at the age of 98 , as well as news of an unusual live performance at the white house .
ok , time to kick things into gear .
author: Neil Smith
Entertainment reporter
